name: Assistant to the Regional Monster
description:
Created in 10 day for vimjam2. 

QUICK TIPS: HOLD the fire button down to shoot (never let go, just like Jack.  Tapping is not fun).  Your mouse or joystick controls the camera.

 Play as eyeball face, an assistant to the regional monster at the local terror firm. Only the boss is well, a monster.  And a little on the edge today.  Complete all your tasks quickly or there's gonna be trouble.  

What tasks you say? Well, there is a timer, you need to complete all the task before it runs out or lose your job.  The tasks are completed by returning to the boss after collecting the requested item.

If you die a few times, I would recommend a browser refresh (pretty sure it gets buggy)

Controller Recommended

Move = left joystick

shoot = right trigger

aim = right joystick

Keyboard

Move = arrow keys or wasd

shoot = mouse click

aim = mouse
